message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $115. It's worth a lot more than that, but I'm willing to make a good deal for you.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $100 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further. How about $110? That's still a fair price for both of us.
I see your point, Alice. Considering your willingness to lower the price, I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.
